profile.picture: public URL to a profile picture (Instagram, Twitter, Google+)

preview.snippet: short text, it's limit is 140 characters. (Google+)

data.content: this is a tweet! The entire text of the tweet (Instagram, Twitter, Google+, Flickr)

image.small: public URL to a small size image (Instagram)
image.medium: public URL to a medium size image (Instagram, Twitter, Google+, Flickr)
image.large: public URL to a large size image

video.low: public URL to a low quality video
video.medium: public URL to a medium quality video (Google+)
video.high: public URL to a high quality video (HD!!)

stream.url: public URL to a livestream event (Twitter)

audio.low: public URL to a low quality audio
audio.medium: public URL to a medium quality audio
audio.hight: public URL to a high quality audio

data.date: the date that it was pulished!! (Instagram, Twitter, Google+, Flickr)
data.link: URL to this tweet! (Instagram, Google+, Flickr)
data.source: Facebook | Twitter | Youtube | Flickr | Instagram | Vimeo | Google+ | Flickr
